China has cctv cameras. if we place holoprojectors everywhere, not only logged in FB users will be able to access AR worlds, and be advertised to of course, but also those who don't have a hololens or glasses, will have an AR metaverse. The future is projection, the Metaverse will never be a headset wearing place. The future of AR, Mixed Reality, and VR, is Projection, not Wearing clunky buckets on our heads. the 3-time failure of 3D TV/Cinema has proved that people won't even wear glasses, never mind a headset.

OK, everyone giving the whole "Vocaloid did it first" speech, Vocaloid concerts are a rear projection light diffusion hologram, what they're using here is called "Pepper's Ghost" a technology and illusion that dates back to Shakespearean times, and was even used in the first production of Hamlet.

And my company is the exclusive distributors and representers to our brand called Hypervsn in the whole Baltics and Skandinavian regions. And i say, that this is really nicely done! Good job! Years ago my dad found a Halloween DVD that had us propping our CRT TV pointing upwards (actually, we put it in our hope chest) at our front window and placed a slanted large piece of plexiglass above it.  The DVD showed a series of humorous crystal ball character heads to the outside, with audio.  Then when we finally got sick of that, later at night we would watch Abbott and Costello Meet the Mummy on it.  It was pretty cool, though just a simple reflection of course.  But it was also kind of ridiculous because of our CRT displays at the time. lol
